subject: Parts missing #SSN5678
description_text:
Good morning,

In my order I purchased I have just received my pedals however I have not received my 2 VAM Pro linear motors or my 2 U-Shape mounting bracket.

I have attached my order summary along with my package that doesn't include those items stated above.

Could you please let me know what is going on.

Thank you.

Kind regards.

Leon.


Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

conversations.body_text: 你好，莱昂·谢利  您的订单将分多个包裹寄出。我会帮您查询VAM Pro的最新物流/追踪状态，并在有更新信息后立即通知您。
Hi Leon Shelley,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our warehouse did indeed omit your haptics from the shipment. We will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you on Monday.

Thank you.

I totally understand these things do happen.

Thanks for sending out the replacement parts.

Kind regards.

Leon.

Sent from Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
________________________________
Hi Leon Shelley,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
Hi Leon Shelley,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047252846947
